description: This methods course introduces pre-service teachers to theory, practice, and methods associated with developing reading/language art skills in elementary pupils. It includes an emphasis on teaching to pupils of diverse socio-economic backgrounds and cultures. This course continues the study of Education 322: Teaching of Reading K-6 and Education 321: Teaching of Reading 5-12.
name: Reading Comm Literacy
notes: This class will meet in Modular Classroom 2 on June 4-8th, 9-4:00.
title: Reading, Communication, and Literacy Methods
